titleStmt.title: Despatch from John H. Smyth to John Hay, October 5, 1880

bibl.title: Despatch from John H. Smyth to John Hay
Despatches from United States Consuls in Monrovia, 1852-1906

div1.p:
Consulate General of the United States,
Monrovia, Liberia,
October 5, 1880.
Mr. J. H. Smyth to Ass't Sec'y of State.

Consulate General of the United States,
Monrovia, Liberia
October 5, 1880.
Please find enclosed the returns and account for the quarter ending Sept. 30, 1880, as follows:
Digest of invoice book, #1; register of official letters received, #2; register of official letters sent, #3; arrivals and departures of American vessels, #4; rent and miscellaneous expenses, #5.

I am, Sir,
Your
Hon. John Hay,
Assistant Secretary of State,
Washington, D.C.
Your obedient servant,
Jno. H. Smyth, U.S. Consul General

1 Digest of Invoice book
2 Register of Official letters rec'd
3 Register of Official letters sent
4 Arrivals & departures of American vessels
5 Rent & miscellaneous expense a/c.
